snippet: “Brush Up Your Shakespeare: The Bard and the Broadway Musical” traces Shakespeare’s more fruitful unions with Cole Porter, Leonard Bernstein and others.
abstract: Stephen Holden reviews concert of Broadway music adapted from Shakespeare's plays and poems at 92nd Street Y as part of its Lyrics & Lyricists series.
lead_paragraph: “Brush Up Your Shakespeare: The Bard and the Broadway Musical” traces Shakespeare’s more fruitful unions with Cole Porter, Leonard Bernstein and others.

headline.seo: ‘Brush Up Your Shakespeare’ at the 92nd Street Y
headline.main: If Chorus Lines Be the Food of Love
headline.print_headline: If Chorus Lines Be the Food Of Love
